text: What strategies can you use for combining positive and negative integers to find a total value?

Students will use their intuitive number sense at this time in the unit. It is likely at this time that students' answers will relate to the context of points in the game.

  • Losing 500 points may be thought of as “subtract 500” or “a number 500 spaces to the left of 0”.
  • Subtracting 500 points is the same as adding –500 points, foreshadowing a -b = a +-b
  • Intuitively, –500 points is less than –200 points in the game, but less obvious in the abstract. Some students might also think that it is greater because there are “more negative points” (which is absolute value thinking).
  • Adding 300 points and the loosing 300 points puts you back to 0, thus foreshadowing a + -a = 0
